avocado_salad_dressing.name: Avocado Salad Dressing
avocado_salad_dressing.ingredients: avocado: 2; lemon juice: 1.5 tablespoon; Maple syrup: 1 tablespoon
avocado_salad_dressing.directions: Add all ingredients to blender; Blend

pasta_&_veggies.name: Pasta & Veggies
pasta_&_veggies.ingredients: Red Pepper: 2; Celery: 2; Onion: 2; basil: 1 tablspoon
pasta_&_veggies.directions: Saute red pepper, celery and onion in water first; turn on high

oatmeal_&_bananas.name: Oatmeal & Bananas
oatmeal_&_bananas.ingredients: Oatmeal: 3-4 scoops (1/3 cup); Water: 2-3 bottles; Cinnamon: cover oatmeal Bananas: 4-5
oatmeal_&_bananas.directions: Put oatmeal and water in pot; Put cinnamon on top; Turn over on medium; Stir half way through; Enjoy 3-4 bowls with placing banana in bowl and covering with hot oatmeal!
